reviewText: This is a great comedy act.  It's a little offensive, but not terribly so, especially in comparison to many other comedians out there.  The highlight of the show is his impressions of William Shatner and Christopher Walkins.  Hilarious and spot on!

reviewText: Kevin Pollack is a brilliant comedian. He does imitations that had me falling out of my chair laughing. I recommend it to anyone who enjoys a good laugh. I smile just thinking about this show.
Title: N/A

reviewText: If you're a fan of Pollak's I would assume that you've seen this stand up act.  If you haven't: then you must make it a point to watch.  It's hilarious.  He is one of the best imitators of others that I've ever seen.  Who doesn't love his take of Captain Kirk?  In this show, he goes on for quite some time about prank calling Alan Arkin.  I had the pleasure of seeing Mr. Arkin in person in an intimate stage show setting.  I was able to ask him about Kevin Pollak and his claim to prank calling Arkin extensively.  Arkin verified that the whole story was true; it really did happen.  The man next to me asked me about this show and I recommended the DVD to him.  It's great.
Title: N/A
